text: thumb|250px|Dorothee Wilms, 1986 Dorothee Wilms (born October 11, 1929) is a German politician.Eva Kolinsky, Women in contemporary Germany: life, work, and politics, Berg Publishers, 1993, p227 She was born in Grevenbroich, Germany. From 1982 to 1987 she was the Federal Minister for Education and Science. From 1987 to 1991, Wilms was the Federal Minister for Inner-German relations. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Education ministers of Germany Category:Intra-German Relations ministers
title: Dorothee Wilms
